Package goGame

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • goGame.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalPlayer, RemotePlayer
    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for keeping a model of a player in the GO game.
    Author:
    Huub Lievestro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Player​(java.lang.String name, Stone colour)
      Creates a new Player object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              Stone colour)
        Creates a new Player object.
        Requires
        name is not null, colour is either GoGameConstants.BLACK or GoGameConstants.WHITE
        Ensures
        the Name of this player will be name, the Stone of this player will be colour

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the player.

      • getColour

        public Stone getColour()
        Returns the colour of the player.

      • determineMove

        public abstract int determineMove​(Board board)
                           throws TimeOutException
        Determines the field for the next move.
        Parameters:
        board - the current game board
        Returns:
        the player's choice
        Throws:
        TimeOutException
        Requires
        board is not null and not full
        Ensures
        the returned in is a valid field index and that field is empty, or -1 to pass

      • hasGUI

        public boolean hasGUI()
        Check if this Player has a (a field named) GUI.

        Parameters:

        Requires
